application.name: 正方教务查询
application.ability: 正方教务用来查询成绩,补考,课表,信息等
application.description: 定制模块,所以具体还是要修改的
application.author: Yoby

manifest.install: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_chengji`; CREATE TABLE `ims_chengji` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `cj_user` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `cj_pass` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL, `weid` tinyint(3) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备用字段微信公众号编号', `num` int(10) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备用查询次数', `from_user` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `createtime` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
